page.title: 05NEW HALL FARM
page.content: My Grandad Mr.Smith owns this farm. My Dad works the farm and drives the combine harvester in the summer. We have 9 ducks and I collect the eggs. Uncle David has the two nice farm dogs Silver and Pup. We grow apples, damsons, plums and gooseberries. We grow red and white potatoes, cauliflowers and cabbage. We have 8 wild cats. The mother cat's name is Wonder. Dad says we might get some pigs to eat up the last of the potatoes. Grandad works on the farm as well. He saws up the wood to make boxes for the cabbages and cauliflowers. Uncle David takes them to London in his lorry nearly every night. He takes one of the dogs with him. They both have turns riding to market.
